title: 关于地图上传服务器的
author: TD_Daytime
txt_content:
本帖最后由 TD_Daytime 于 2020-2-27 23:07 编辑 

就是不知道大佬们有没有玩过2403大佬的战线，里面莫比乌斯坠机点可以说是一个较为简单的极限生存，所以本来想着在私服上传了和同学一起玩玩。
但是始终不成功，我mod是一个一个加的，加到nei就不行了。额听说是03大佬有个防盗，求解决！！！！
---------------------------------------------以上为阶段一。现在出现了第二个问题，就是匠魂无法加载，显示的是地幔可用，而其他组件无法使用。尝试更换过其他的匠魂也是失败。切换java版本，客服那边说的是服务器的java没有区别？？？？以下为出错代码。
ERROR Bukkit implementation detected. This may cause issues. Bukkit implementations include Craftbukkit and Cauldron(MCPC+).
27.02 20:49:47 [Server] INFO Preparing to take over the world
27.02 20:49:47 [Server] ERROR Skipping event FMLConstructionEvent and marking errored mod TiCTooltips since required dependency TConstruct has errored
27.02 20:49:47 [Server] INFO InvTweaks: net.minecraft.inventory.Container
27.02 20:49:48 [Server] ERROR Skipping event FMLConstructionEvent and marking errored mod IguanaTweaksTConstruct since required dependency TConstruct has errored
27.02 20:49:48 [Server] ERROR Fatal errors were detected during the transition from CONSTRUCTING to PREINITIALIZATION. Loading cannot continue复制代码INFO States: 'U' = Unloaded 'L' = Loaded 'C' = Constructed 'H' = Pre-initialized 'I' = Initialized 'J' = Post-initialized 'A' = Available 'D' = Disabled 'E' = Errored
INFO UC        Mantle{1.7.10-0.3.2.jenkins184} [Mantle] ([匠魂手册]Mantle-1.7.10-0.3.2.jar) 
27.02 20:49:48 [Server] INFO UE        TConstruct{1.7.10-1.8.7.build979} [Tinkers' Construct] ([匠魂本体]TConstruct-1.7.10-1.8.7.jar) 
27.02 20:49:48 [Server] INFO UE        TiCTooltips{1.2.3} [TiC Tooltips] ([匠魂工具]TiCTooltips-mc1.7.10-1.2.3.jar) 复制代码------------------------------------------------------------------------------
阶段三更新。服务器正常运作，开服之后一秒暴毙
27.02 22:51:47 [Server] INFO ... 2 more
27.02 22:51:47 [Server] INFO Server paraspawn
27.02 22:51:47 [Server] ERROR Encountered an unexpected exception复制代码

replies.author: Mr.阿冬
replies.txt_content: NEI是有前置 的，装了吗

replies.author: TD_Daytime
replies.txt_content:
Mr.阿冬 发表于 2020-2-27 13:02
NEI是有前置 的，装了吗
我先装的所有mod的前置

replies.author: TD_Daytime
replies.txt_content:
我爱魁拔 发表于 2020-2-27 10:44
服务端不用装nei
真假？？？？

replies.author: Mr.阿冬
replies.txt_content:
TD_Daytime 发表于 2020-2-27 16:50
真假？？？？
是的，服务端可以不用装NEI

replies.author: TD_Daytime
replies.txt_content: 现在的问题很大，就是遇到意外问题！！服务器正常运作之后，已经开了服，下一秒暴毙。

replies.author: Art_YaLi
replies.txt_content: NEI不需要装在服务端是一个地图转码需要是另一个啊
